name: blazor-starter
description: This template contains an example .NET 6 [Blazor WebAssembly](https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/core/blazor/?view=aspnetcore-6.0#blazor-webassembly) client application, a .NET 6 C# [Azure Functions](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-functions/functions-overview), and a C# class library with shared code.

scripts.start: swa start http://localhost:5000 --run 'dotnet run --project Client/Client.csproj' --api-location Api
